hotels.title: Hiroshima Lavish Urban Escape within the Commercial District
hotels.description: The ANA Crowne Plaza Hiroshima, an IHG Hotel is a serene urban escape in the heart of this beautiful city's commercial district. Experience Hiroshima's turbulent heritage at the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park, shop in stylish boutiques or devour Hiroshima-style okonomiyaki from street vendors. As the sun sets, retire to the hotel for a lavish dining experience at one of the many onsite dining options before a soothing slumber in a refined guest room.
